2011

5 Aug 2011: Late Shift Extra: ReAnimate at the National Portrait Gallery.
Included the Atmospheric Railway by Adam Stark and Di Mainstone (see Programme)
Video: http://vimeo.com/28937762
Featured in New Scientist,
